channel.title: Romantic Rewrite
channel.desc: When a book editor helps a mystery writer add a romantic skew to his novel, their fictional love story falls of the pages and into the real world.

channel.title: Hidden Gems
channel.desc: When Addie loses her grandmother's ring in the waters of Hawaii, she hires a sailor to help her to find it, rediscovering her love of the sea along the way.

channel.title: Lease On Love
channel.desc: Poppy and Milo are getting engaged, but only so that she can advance her career and he can move into a penthouse. It's purely transactional. Or is it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Priceless Love
channel.desc: After discovering that the teapot in her secondhand shop is worth thousands of dollars, Rose grabs the attention of an ambitious antique dealer.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: An Easter Bloom
channel.desc: Struggling to save her farm, a woman enters a floral design contest, where she develops a blossoming romance with a local pastor.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Nashville Legacy
channel.desc: When Naima meets Damian after her interest in an undiscovered music group brings her to Nashville, their shared love of music blossoms into something more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Branching Out
channel.desc: A single mum tracks down her daughter's biological father in a wild journey of trust, love and hope. As Ruby connects with her dad, could Amelia also be meeting the one.

channel.title: The Proposal Spot
channel.desc: The owner of a popular caf? could lose everything when a major celebrity is dumped there. Can she get him and his would-be-fiancee back together, or will she fall for him herself.
